messages.subject: Nifty translator
messages.msgSnippet: Just passing by today and thought I d let you guys/gals know... I stumbled upon another translator, slightly better than babel IMHO, nifty globalgate. Here s
messages.messageBody:
Just passing by today and thought I'd let you guys/gals know... I
stumbled upon another translator, slightly better than babel
IMHO, "nifty" globalgate.

Here's the link...

http://www.nifty.com/globalgate/

Right below the URL field is a drop down box... Choose the second
option and hit the button. You're all set. Bye for now... Hope
everyone is doing well.

~wounds
